metadata.titleEn: Provenance analysis data sets of Cenozoic strata of Nepal in the southern Tibetan Plateau
metadata.titleCn: 青藏高原南部尼泊尔新生代物源分析数据
metadata.description: Provenance of Cretaceous-Miocene sedimentary rocks in the Nepalese Lesser Himalayas is significant for understanding the timing and pattern of the India-Asia collision and tectonic evolution of the Himalaya orogen. This research analyses the provenance of Cretaceous-Miocene sedimentary rocks in two representative sections (Butwal section and Kalya section) in Nepalese Lesser Himalaya, which constrain the timing and pattern of the India-Asia collision and reconstruct the tectonic evolution of the Himalayan orogen. An ATL 193 nm ArF excimer laser ablation (LA) system coupled with an Agilent 7700X inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS) instrument was adopted to complete detrital zircon U-Pb dating of ten samples; A Geolas HD LA system coupled with a Neupane Plus multi-collector ICP-MS instrument were used to complete zircon in-situ Hf isotope analysis. Analytical results of detrital zircon U-Pb-Hf indicate that the timing of the India-Asia collision was no later than the early-middle Eocene in the central Himalayas, and the Greater Himalayas exposed to the surface by the early Miocene.
metadata.descriptionCn: 尼泊尔低喜马拉雅白垩系-中新统沉积物源对理解印度-亚洲大陆碰撞时间和方式以及喜马拉雅造山带构造演化史具有重要意义。本研究对尼泊尔低喜马拉雅两条代表性剖面（Butwal剖面和Kalya剖面）白垩系-中新统物源分析约束了印度-亚洲大陆碰撞时间和方式，恢复了喜马拉雅造山带构造演化史。其中，利用ATL-193nm ArF激光剥蚀（LA）系统连接Agilent 7700X等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS）完成10件样品碎屑锆石U-Pb测年工作；利用Geolas HD LA系统连接Neptune Plus多接受等离子体质谱仪（MC-ICP-MS）完成锆石原位Hf同位素测试。碎屑锆石U-Pb-Hf分析结果表明印度-亚洲大陆碰撞时间在喜马拉雅造山带中段不晚于早-中始新世，高喜马拉雅至少在早中新世剥露至地表。
metadata.instructions: The data files are named “Provenance analysis data sets of Cenozoic strata in the southern Tibetan Plateau_Detrital zircon U-Pb age data” and “Provenance analysis data sets of Cenozoic strata in the southern Tibetan Plateau_Zircon in-situ Hf isotope data” based on its content. It was stored as a .xlsx file and can be opened and read by the Excel program directly.
metadata.instructionsCn: 数据文件依据数据内容命名为“Provenance analysis data sets of Cenozoic strata in the southern Tibetan Plateau_Detrital zircon U-Pb age data”和“Provenance analysis data sets of Cenozoic strata in the southern Tibetan Plateau_Zircon in-situ Hf isotope data”，以.xlsx文件格式存储，该数据集可以直接用Excel程序打开并查看。

literatureList.titleEn: Constraints on the timing of the India-Asia collision and unroofing history of the Himalayan orogen using detrital zircon U-Pb-Hf and whole-rock Sr-Nd isotopes in Cretaceous-Miocene Lesser Himalayan sedimentary rocks
literatureList.referenceEn: Feng, W., Meng, Q.Q., Song, C.H., Fang, X.M., Zhuang, G.S., He, P.J., Yang, S.F., Zhang, J., Chen, Y.F., & Zhang, Y.H. (2022). Constraints on the timing of the India-Asia collision and unroofing history of the Himalayan orogen using detrital zircon U-Pb-Hf and whole-rock Sr-Nd isotopes in Cretaceous-Miocene Lesser Himalayan sedimentary rocks. Basin Research, doi: 10.1111/bre.12742.

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to determine the timing and process of the India-Asia continental collision through sediment source analysis in Southern Tibet?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，用于通过沉积物源分析确定印度-亚洲大陆碰撞的时机和过程，特别是在南藏地区？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used for this purpose is the combined use of an ATL-193nm ArF laser ablation system connected to an Agilent 7700X ICP-MS for U-Pb dating of detrital zircons, along with a Geolas HD LA system connected to a Neptune Plus MC-ICP-MS for in-situ zircon Hf isotope testing. This method was applied to analyze samples from two representative sections in the Lower Himalayas of Nepal, which helped constrain the timing of the India-Asia collision and understand the tectonic evolution of the Himalayan orogenic belt.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于此目的的数据收集方法的一个例子是结合使用ATL-193nm ArF激光烧蚀系统与Agilent 7700X ICP-MS进行碎屑锆石的U-Pb定年，以及Geolas HD LA系统与Neptune Plus MC-ICP-MS进行原位锆石Hf同位素测试。该方法应用于分析尼泊尔下喜马拉雅山的两个代表性剖面样本，帮助约束印度-亚洲碰撞的时间，并理解喜马拉雅造山带的构造演化。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What characteristics define the data collection methods used for U-Pb-Hf isotopic analysis in sediment provenance studies in the context of the Himalayas?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在喜马拉雅地区沉积物来源研究中，U-Pb-Hf同位素分析的数据收集方法的特点包括哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: ATL-193nm ArF laser ablation (LA) systems, Agilent 7700X inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (ICP-MS), Geolas HD LA system, Neptune Plus multi-collector ICP-MS
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: ATL-193nm ArF 激光烧蚀 (LA) 系统，Agilent 7700X 电感耦合等离子体质谱仪 (ICP-MS)，Geolas HD LA 系统，Neptune Plus 多接收器 ICP-MS

Definition.QuestionEn: What does '碎屑锆石U-Pb测年' refer to in the context of geochronological data collection methods?
Definition.QuestionCn: '碎屑锆石U-Pb测年'在地质年代学数据收集方法的背景下指的是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: 碎屑锆石U-Pb测年 refers to a geochronological data collection method involving U-Pb dating of detrital zircon grains, used to determine the age of sedimentary deposits. This method involves using an ATL-193nm ArF laser ablation system connected to an Agilent 7700X ICP-MS to measure the isotopic ratios in zircon samples, which helps to constrain the timing of geological events such as the India-Asia continental collision.
Definition.AnswerCn: 碎屑锆石U-Pb测年是一个地质年代测定方法，涉及对碎屑锆石颗粒进行U-Pb定年，以确定沉积物的年龄。该方法使用ATL-193nm ArF激光剥蚀系统连接Agilent 7700X ICP-MS，测量锆石样品中的同位素比率，这有助于约束地质事件的发生时间，例如印度-亚洲大陆碰撞。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors influence the choice of data collection methods for analyzing sediment provenance in the Cretaceous-Miocene formations of the Nepalese Lesser Himalayas?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 影响选择数据收集方法以分析尼泊尔小喜马拉雅山脉白垩纪-中新世地层沉积物来源的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The choice of data collection methods for analyzing sediment provenance in the Cretaceous-Miocene formations of the Nepalese Lesser Himalayas is influenced by the need to accurately determine the timing and mechanisms of the India-Asia continental collision and to reconstruct the tectonic evolution of the Himalayan orogeny. Techniques such as U-Pb dating of detrital zircons using laser ablation systems connected to mass spectrometers are utilized to achieve precise chronological constraints. Additionally, in-situ Hf isotope testing of zircons is performed to further understand the provenance and tectonic settings. These methods are chosen for their ability to provide detailed geochronological and isotopic data essential for interpreting geological histories.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在分析尼泊尔小喜马拉雅山脉的白垩纪-中新世地层的沉积物来源时，数据收集方法的选择受到准确确定印度-亚洲大陆碰撞的时机和机制以及重建喜马拉雅造山带构造演化的需求的影响。采用激光剥蚀系统连接质谱仪的锆石U-Pb定年技术，以实现精确的时间约束。此外，还对锆石进行原位Hf同位素测试，以进一步了解沉积物的来源和构造背景。这些方法之所以被选择，是因为它们能够提供详细的地球年代学和同位素数据，这对于解释地质历史至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential impacts on the understanding of the India-Asia continental collision and the tectonic evolution of the Himalayas when utilizing advanced techniques like LA-ICP-MS and MC-ICP-MS for zircon U-Pb-Hf isotopic analysis in sedimentary provenance studies?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在沉积物源研究中利用LA-ICP-MS和MC-ICP-MS等先进技术进行锆石U-Pb-Hf同位素分析，对理解印度-亚洲大陆碰撞和喜马拉雅山的构造演化有哪些潜在影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing advanced techniques like LA-ICP-MS and MC-ICP-MS for zircon U-Pb-Hf isotopic analysis allows for precise dating and isotopic characterization of detrital zircons, which can lead to a more accurate constraint on the timing and manner of the India-Asia continental collision. This also aids in reconstructing the tectonic evolution history of the Himalayan orogeny, suggesting that the collision in the central Himalayas occurred no later than the early to middle Eocene, and that the High Himalayas were exposed to the surface by at least the early Miocene.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用先进技术如激光剥蚀电感耦合等离子体质谱（LA-ICP-MS）和多收集电感耦合等离子体质谱（MC-ICP-MS）对锆石的铀-铅-铪同位素分析，可以精确地对碎屑锆石进行定年和同位素特征分析，这有助于更准确地约束印度-亚洲大陆碰撞的时间和方式。这也有助于重建喜马拉雅造山带的构造演化历史，表明中央喜马拉雅地区的碰撞发生在早期至中期的始新世之前，并且高喜马拉雅地区至少在早中新世时已暴露于地表。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of analyzing sediment provenance in the Cretaceous-Miocene strata of the southern Tibetan Plateau using U-Pb dating and Hf isotopic analysis?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用U-Pb定年和Hf同位素分析研究西藏南部高原白垩纪-中新世地层沉积物来源的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective is to constrain the timing and manner of the India-Asia continental collision and to reconstruct the tectonic evolutionary history of the Himalayan orogenic belt. This is achieved by analyzing sediment provenance through U-Pb dating and Hf isotopic analysis of detrital zircons, which provides insights into the geological processes involved in the formation and development of the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 主要目标是限制印度-亚洲大陆碰撞的时间和方式，并重建喜马拉雅造山带的构造演化历史。这是通过分析沉积物来源，采用U-Pb定年和碎屑锆石的Hf同位素分析来实现的，这为了解该地区形成和发展的地质过程提供了见解。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the procedural steps and instruments involved in conducting U-Pb dating of detrital zircon samples to analyze sediment provenance in the Himalaya region?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在喜马拉雅地区进行碎屑锆石样品的U-Pb定年以分析沉积物来源的程序步骤和仪器有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedural steps and instruments involved include using the ATL-193nm ArF laser ablation (LA) system connected to an Agilent 7700X inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometer (ICP-MS) to perform U-Pb dating of detrital zircon samples. Additionally, the Geolas HD LA system connected to a Neptune Plus multi-collector ICP-MS is used for in-situ Hf isotope testing. These methodologies help constrain the timing and manner of India-Asia continental collision and understand the tectonic evolution of the Himalayan orogeny.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 所涉及的程序步骤和仪器包括使用ATL-193nm ArF激光烧蚀（LA）系统，连接到Agilent 7700X感应耦合等离子体质谱仪（ICP-MS），对碎屑锆石样品进行U-Pb定年。此外，使用Geolas HD LA系统连接到Neptune Plus多收集器ICP-MS进行原位Hf同位素测试。这些方法有助于约束印度-亚洲大陆碰撞的时间和方式，并理解喜马拉雅造山带的构造演化。
